Description: Jugate busts of Ptolemy II, diademed and wearing chlamys, and Arsinoe II, diademed and veiled, right; left field, shield; dotted border.
Jugate busts of Ptolemy I, diademed and wearing aegis, and Berenice I, diademed and veiled, right; dotted border.
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (606) (type)
